page.title: 06"THE POPLARS"
page.content: "The Poplars " has been open for just over forty years and the beer they serve is made by the traditional way and served from wooden casks. That's probably why most Daddies go there. It got its name from the lombardy poplar trees outside. "The Poplars" has just been decorated and has a new sign saying "THE POPLARS - WADWORTHS" .The pub looks a lot better now it's a creamy green. It's good because when you take your children, there is a large field to play in safely. When the cricketers are playing the adults can watch them. There are tables to sit at while you watch. We play chase round the cricket square. If a man knocks a ball over the hedge he scores six but is out . There are also lime trees .In July we play with white fluff that comes off the trees.
